snippet: The F.B.I. has been interviewing ex-lawmakers and lobbyists about whether some of Gov. Sam Brownback’s current staff members and former aides acted improperly in soliciting campaign contributions and clients.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation is examining fund-raising and lobbying activities of associates of Kansas Gov Sam Brownback following allegations that some of his current and former staff members have acted improperly in soliciting campaign donations; Brownback denies wrongdoing, but investigation may effect his re-election.
lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. has been interviewing ex-lawmakers and lobbyists about whether some of Gov. Sam Brownback’s current staff members and former aides acted improperly in soliciting campaign contributions and clients.

headline.main: Associates of Kansas Governor Are Investigated Over Fund-Raising and Lobbying
headline.print_headline: Associates of Kansas Governor Investigated Over Fund-Raising and Lobbying
